thread.title: Alan Sinclair
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Alan Sinclair

author: Alan Sinclair
title: Alan Sinclair
text: I have been buying ECCO brand shoes for many years. Introduced to them by my Danish wife. I have an awkward foot shape and need specialised suppourt insoles. Despite this I rarely have a problem getting a good fit even with Internet shopping.
